amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for specified research activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in the bill for specified research activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 222 (Roll no. 289).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Campbell (CA).
